hover.description: For "hover" state that use no background fill.  (black-6% | white-6%)

pressed.description: For "pressed" state that use no background fill.  (black-12% | white-12%)

muted.description: For the softest contrast neutral text (not accessible)
For the weakest contrast neutral icons (not accessible)
For the weakest  contrast neutral border (grey200-40% | grey400-20%)

default.description: For the default shade of screen (black-40%)

alternative.description: For a stronger shade of screen (black-80%)

inverse.description: For elements used on top of overlay/alternative. Used for text, icon or border

default.description: For interactive, active, and selected semantics. Used for text, background, icon or border

alternative.description: For the stronger contrast primary semantic elements.

muted.description: For the weakest contrast primary semantic backgrounds. (blue500-10% | blue300-15%)

inverse.description: For elements used on top of primary/default. Used for text, icon or border

default-hover.description: For the "hover" state of primary-default elements

default-pressed.description: For the "pressed" state of primary-default elements

default.description: For the critical alert semantic elements. Used for text, background, icon or border

alternative.description: For the stronger contrast error semantic elements.

muted.description: For the weakest contrast critical alert semantic backgrounds. (red500-10% | red300-15%)

inverse.description: For elements used on top of error/default. Used for text, icon or border

default-hover.description: For the "hover" state of error-default elements.

default-pressed.description: For the "pressed" state of error-default elements.

default.description: For the caution alert semantic elements. Used for text, background, icon or border

muted.description: For the weakest contrast caution alert semantic backgrounds. (yellow500-10% | yellow100-15%)

inverse.description: For elements used on top of warning/default. Used for text, icon or border

default-hover.description: For the "hover" state of warning-default elements

default-pressed.description: For the "pressed" state of warning-default elements

default.description: For the positive semantic elements. Used for text, background, icon or border

muted.description: For the weakest contrast positive semantic backgrounds. (green500-10% | green300-10%)

inverse.description: For elements used on top of success/default. Used for text, icon or border

default-hover.description: For the "hover" state of success-default elements

default-pressed.description: For the "pressed" state of success-default elements

default.description: For informational read-only elements. Used for text, background, icon or border

muted.description: For the weakest contrast informational semantic backgrounds.(blue500-10% | blue300-15%)

inverse.description: For elements used on top of info/default. Used for text, icon or border
For elements used on top of flask/default. Used for text, icon or border

default.description: For neutral drop shadow color. (black-10% | black-40%)

primary.description: For primary drop shadow color. (blue500-20% | blue300-20%)

error.description: For critical/danger drop shadow color. (red50-20% | red300-20%)
